title: Studio in East Hollywood w/ Gas Range + Outdoor Lounge
posting_body: Very charming studio inside a Beautiful Old Hollywood-style building.
Located right off Fountain, walking distance from many restaurants and shops.
Less than a 5-minute drive to Silver Lake, Los Feliz, and Virgil Village.
The exposed brick wall makes this one a gem!
​​​​​​​You also have access to a common area w/ BBQ — host the dinner party of your dreams, under charming string lights.
Other amenities include Bike storage and in-building laundry.
We would love to hear from you!
Get in touch with one of our community specialists who can help you find the perfect home!
